name: Phone Heaven
discription: Admit, Buyer, Seller Role Available with their dynamic dashboards
JWT token are used to fetch from database and to secure user information
Each user has different roles such as admin can delete buyer or seller, admin can verify the buyer and so on

name: Dentist Fantastic
discription: User Authentication with Firebase. User can login and Register
A user can add comments but user have to be logged in. If the user is not logged in, then comment box would be invisible
User can Add a comment or edit their previous comment and Remove their Previous comment

name: Infinite Course
discription: Authentication done with Firebase. User can login with providers email and password
Each course has dynamic details page and dynamic checkout page. User have to logged in to go to checkout page
User can download the course details page which is implemented using react-to-pdf
